description:
It`s Lucy vs. Bydo and Gray vs. Sugar Boy in a mad dash for the key to the Dragon Chain Cannon! Edolas plans to use it to ram the lacrima into Extalia, so the Fairy Tail gang goes all out to make sure that key never falls back into King Faust`s hands!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Pride`s Sake, the River of Stars
Hoshi no Taiga wa Hokori no Tame ni
Orgulhe-Se Do Grande Rio De Estrelas!
Pour la fierté du fleuve étoilé
星の大河は誇りの為に
